beneficiaries.title: Beneficiaries and Purposes
beneficiaries.description: This platform enables all financial analysis beneficiaries, whether individuals, entities, or organizations, to perform all known quantitative financial analysis types worldwide
beneficiaries.owners: Helps company owners understand their company's financial performance easily and quickly
beneficiaries.analysts: Helps financial managers or analysts complete their work in seconds
beneficiaries.investors: Helps any investor make instant decisions to buy shares of a specific company
beneficiaries.banks: Helps bank employees evaluate company performance for financing and lending decisions
beneficiaries.valuers: Helps evaluate feasibility of new projects or company valuations
beneficiaries.general: Helps all those interested in financial analysis, whether individual, organization, or entity

step1.title: Upload Your Statements
step1.description: Upload financial statements or trial balances in any format

step2.title: Select Analysis Options
step2.description: Choose language, sector, activity, and required analysis type

step3.title: Click Analyze
step3.description: Get comprehensive and detailed analysis in seconds

classical.title: Classical Foundational Analysis
classical.structural: Structural Analysis of Financial Statements (13 types)

advanced.title: Advanced and Sophisticated Analysis
advanced.forecasting: Forecasting and Credit Scoring Models (10 models)

testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.client1: Comprehensive and integrated system that helped me understand my company's performance quickly, accurately, and easily. It's an amazing system that provides all types of financial analysis.
testimonials.client2: As a financial manager and analyst, I no longer need to waste time on lengthy calculations, and all my work has become easier and my meetings more professional.
testimonials.client3: As an investor, I can now make instant investment decisions and identify company stocks I want to invest in with confidence.
testimonials.client4: In my role as an employee responsible for financing and lending operations, the system has helped me evaluate companies quickly and accurately.
